mapper.select: select IFNULL(( SELECT MANAGEMENT_SCORE FROM WBMP_MANGEMENT_SCORE WHERE ORG_ID=#{orgId} and DATE_FORMAT(MANAGEMENT_DATE,'%Y-%m')=#{mouth} ORDER BY MANAGEMENT_DATE desc LIMIT 1),0)
select IFNULL((SELECT MANAGEMENT_SCORE FROM WBMP_MANGEMENT_SCORE WHERE ORG_ID=#{orgId} and DATE_FORMAT(MANAGEMENT_DATE,'%Y')=#{year} ORDER BY MANAGEMENT_DATE desc LIMIT 1),0)

SELECT s.ORG_ID AS org_id,s.MANAGEMENT_SCORE AS score,DATE_FORMAT(s.MANAGEMENT_DATE,'%Y-%m') AS date_dt FROM `wbmp_mangement_score` s INNER JOIN (SELECT ORG_ID,MAX(MANAGEMENT_DATE)as date_dt FROM `wbmp_mangement_score` GROUP BY ORG_ID, DATE_FORMAT(MANAGEMENT_DATE,'%Y-%m') ORDER BY MANAGEMENT_DATE DESC LIMIT 10000 ) a on s.ORG_ID = a.ORG_ID and s.MANAGEMENT_DATE = a.date_dt where a.ORG_ID = #{orgId} ORDER BY s.MANAGEMENT_DATE desc limit 13

SELECT s.ORG_ID AS org_id,s.MANAGEMENT_SCORE AS score, CONCAT(year(s.MANAGEMENT_DATE),'-', quarter(s.MANAGEMENT_DATE)) AS date_dt FROM `wbmp_mangement_score` s INNER JOIN (SELECT ORG_ID,MAX(MANAGEMENT_DATE)as MANAGEMENT_DATE FROM `wbmp_mangement_score` GROUP BY ORG_ID, CONCAT(year(MANAGEMENT_DATE),'-', quarter(MANAGEMENT_DATE)) ORDER BY MANAGEMENT_DATE DESC LIMIT 10000 ) a on s.ORG_ID = a.ORG_ID and s.MANAGEMENT_DATE = a.MANAGEMENT_DATE where a.ORG_ID = #{orgId} ORDER BY s.MANAGEMENT_DATE LIMIT 5

SELECT s.ORG_ID AS org_id,s.MANAGEMENT_SCORE AS score ,DATE_FORMAT(s.MANAGEMENT_DATE,'%Y') AS date_dt FROM `wbmp_mangement_score` s INNER JOIN (SELECT ORG_ID,MAX(MANAGEMENT_DATE)as MANAGEMENT_DATE FROM `wbmp_mangement_score` GROUP BY ORG_ID, DATE_FORMAT(MANAGEMENT_DATE,'%Y') ORDER BY MANAGEMENT_DATE DESC LIMIT 10000 ) a on s.ORG_ID = a.ORG_ID and s.MANAGEMENT_DATE = a.MANAGEMENT_DATE and a.ORG_ID = #{orgId} ORDER BY s.MANAGEMENT_DATE desc LIMIT 3
